text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake adama santanara pithira paraa tara bansadharaka uliya'ichila arau sihamtara nijara bisaye sbikaraokti grahana karaichila arau kaichila, ‘ma'i tomalokara raba nahaya ne? Sihamte kaichila, ‘haya niscaya, ami saksi thakilo’. E'ito e'i babe ye, tomaloke yate kiyamatara dina ka’ba noraaraa ye, ami e'i bisaye jana'i nachilo
